name: Shark Runner
description:
SHARK RUNNER

A tame single player endless runner where you have the power to flip your gravity. Use your epic parkour skills and items you find along the way to evade the angry (literal) Loan Shark. The most jaw dropping game you'll ever play.

CONTROLS:

Space Bar to Jump.

G or Left Alt to reverse your gravity.

If you collide with a hand, use T to throw what you grabbed.

CREDITS:
